articles.title: Configuring a custom domain for your GitHub Pages site
articles.subtitle: You can customize the domain name of your GitHub Pages site.

articles.title: Troubleshooting custom domains and GitHub Pages
articles.subtitle: You can check for common errors to resolve issues with custom domains or HTTPS for your GitHub Pages site.

articles.title: Configuring a publishing source for your GitHub Pages site
articles.subtitle: If you use the default publishing source for your GitHub Pages site, your site will publish automatically. You can also choose to publish your site from a different branch or folder.

articles.title: Securing your GitHub Pages site with HTTPS
articles.subtitle: HTTPS adds a layer of encryption that prevents others from snooping on or tampering with traffic to your site. You can enforce HTTPS for your GitHub Pages site to transparently redirect all HTTP requests to HTTPS.

options.title: Ask the community
options.subtitle: Ask questions, swap stories, share ideas on the community forum.

options.title: What's new
options.subtitle: Discover the latest GitHub Pages updates on our blog

video.title: Access control for GitHub Pages - GitHub Checkout
video.subtitle: GitHub Pages now gives you the option to limit access, making the site visible only to users with access to the repository that published the Page.
